page.title: 17Lifestyles Newton contd.
page.content: Women's Institutes hold monthly meetings in the villages which attract both young and old. School starts at 5 years and the official school leaving age is 16. Lifestyles have not changed so much apart from the advent of television. There are few musical instruments in the home.The average working week is 40 hours with 2/3 weeks annual holiday.Some go abroad some holiday in the U.K. and some stay at home. Saturday and Sunday are free days.Saturdays are often spent in the garden, playing sport shopping,visiting friends or relatives Shops are closed on Sundays.Few people attend church. Marriage is still popular but couples tend to live together before marriage. Divorce is on the increase. The birthrate in the area is steady.
